title: The Unusual Suspects: An Improvised Murder Mystery
description:
Who Dunnit: The Improvised Murder Mystery is now The Unusual Suspects... new name, same great show.

The hottest show in the history of the 757 is NOW A NATIONALLY TOURING SHOW!

The Unusual Suspects

There’s been a murder. Everyone is a suspect. The actors on stage. Even you.

Welcome to The Unusual Suspects, an improvised murder mystery comedy.

Throughout the night, the world’s greatest detective will interrogate a cast of unusual characters, from the wacky to the dastardly.

You’ll find yourself face to face with our notorious investigator. Could he be Sherlock, Columbo, Jessica Fletcher? Not exactly. The catch is, no one ever knows which detective will show up.

No one is above suspicion, including you and your guests.

Join us at the hit show that’s played to sold-out audiences for more than three years and counting. This isn’t your standard dinner detective fare; get ready for a wild and funny night that everyone will be talking about the next day, your family, your friends, and maybe even your priest.

The Unusual Suspects is brought to you by the writers and producers of the off-Broadway and national hit: Cuff Me: The Fifty Shades of Grey Musical Parody.

The Unusual Suspects: An Improvised Murder Mystery Comedy

The second Saturday of every month at the Push Comedy Theater

The show starts at 8pm, tickets are $15

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

---

The Push Comedy Theater is a 99 seat venue in the heart of Norfolk's brand new Arts District. Founded by local comedy group The Pushers, the Push Comedy Theater is dedicated to bringing you live comedy from the best local and national acts.

The Push Comedy Theater hosts live sketch, improv and stand-up comedy on Friday and Saturday nights. During the week classes are offered in stand-up, sketch and improv comedy as well as acting.

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.

title: Comedy at The Plot with the Push Comedy Theater
description:
Comedy at The Plot with the Push Comedy Theater... sponsored by The Muse Writer's Center and Linda Daniels Realtor.



Get ready for a night of poetry, comedy and the return of the Push Comedy Theater.

After nearly 4 long months, your favorite comedians are back!!!  The Push Comedy Theater is taking over The Plot for a night of comedy under the stars.  The Pushers have assembled their funniest friends for a night of improv comedy. 



Comedy at the Push Comedy Theater is back!

-Beer and Wine will be available.

-Get Select food items from the Wiener Hole.

-Waiters and Waitresses will be on hand to bring food and drinks to your seats.

-Hand sanitizing stations will be at the entrance and at the concession stand.

-Masks are encouraged and will be provided at the ticket booth if needed.



We are limiting this event to only 60 people.  Seats will be distanced 6 to 8 feet from each other. The show is general admission.

The Push Comedy Theater would like to thank The Muse Writers Center and Linda Daniel Realtor.  It's because of their generous support that our little comedy theater can start making people laugh again.

If you have questions, please email us at pusherscomedy@gmail.com

title: The Improv Riot: The Short Form Improv Show
description:
Get ready for short form (Whose Line is it Anyway?) improv at the Push Comedy Theater.

You demanded it! So now it's here!!! Our very own short form improv show. All the fun of Whose Line is it Anyway... right here in Downtown Norfolk.

The Improv Riot: The Short Form Improv Show! Sponsored by The Muse Writers Center, Linda Daniel, REALTOR and The NorVA.



This is a highly interactive show... where your suggestions will inspire a night full of comedy.

---

Comedy at the Push Comedy Theater is back!

-Beer and Wine will be available.

-Get Select food items from the Wiener Hole.

-Waiters and Waitresses will be on hand to bring food and drinks to your seats.

-Hand sanitizing stations will be at the entrance and at the concession stand.

-Masks are encouraged and will be provided at the ticket booth if needed.

We are limiting this event to only 60 people. Seats will be distanced 6 to 8 feet from each other. The show is general admission.

The second tier will be individual, general admission tickets. These tickets are for the bleachers set up behind the container garden and to the left of the stage.

The Push Comedy Theater would like to thank The Muse Writers Center and Linda Daniel Realtor. It's because of their generous support that our little comedy theater can start making people laugh again.

If you have questions, please email us at pusherscomedy@gmail.com

title: Improv Comedy with Lemon Pepper & Sazón
description:
Lemon Pepper and Sazon Comedy is a collective of diverse performers in the Hampton Roads area. The group includes seasoned and trained, actors, models, comedians, sketch writers/performers, improvisers, hosts, singers, bloggers and influencers.



Lemon Pepper and Sazon offers private and corporate event performances and are skilled in engaging crowds of all shapes and sizes.   Lemon Pepper and Sazon Comedy was founded on the idea of bringing diversity and inclusion to improv and sketch comedy in the Hampton Roads Area.



Current Roster:

Donna Lewis – Stand-Up Comedian, Improviser, Sketch Writer/Performer, Host

Launa - Actress, Model, Influencer, Sketch writer/performer, Improviser, Host, Stand-Up Comedian

Jordan Burton – Host, Improvisers, Sketch Writer/Performer, Blogger

Enver Siddiky - Actor, Standup-Comedian, Sketch writer/performer, Improviser, Host,

Margarita Cruz-Vargas - Stand-Up Comedian, Host, Improviser, Sketch Writer/Performer

Troy Vincent – Improviser, Sketch Writer/Performer,

Jenny Do – Improviser, Sketch Writer/Performer

Daijerous Poole – Actor, Singer, Improviser, Blogger, Sketch Performer

Ted Cornista- Improviser, Stand-up Comedian Sketch Writer/Performer



Comedy at the Push Comedy Theater is back!

-Beer and Wine will be available.

-Get Select food items from the Wiener Hole.

-Waiters and Waitresses will be on hand to bring food and drinks to your seats.

-Hand sanitizing stations will be at the entrance and at the concession stand.

-Masks are encouraged and will be provided at the ticket booth if needed.



We are limiting this event to only 60 people. Seats will be distanced 6 to 8 feet from each other. The show is general admission.



The Push Comedy Theater would like to thank The Muse Writers Center, Linda Daniel Realtor, and The NorVa. It's because of their generous support that our little comedy theater can start making people laugh again.

If you have questions, please email us at pusherscomedy@gmail.com

title: Date Night at The Plot with Push Comedy Theater
description:
We improvise your relationship.
It's the most fun you'll ever have on date night!

Welcome to Date Night, the hilarious show from the Push Comedy Theater.  Two lucky couples will see the story of their love unfold on stage. Improvised by 2 of Hampton Roads' funniest and wackiest comedians!

The couples will be selected at random and socially distanced interviewed on stage in front of the audience. The Pushers' (and Portsmouth's favorite son) Brad McMurran and a Courtney Richards will use that information to improvise the story of the couple's relationship.

For years, The Pushers have been getting to know diverse couples all across Hampton Roads with this signature piece. Don't miss one of the Push Comedy Theater's signature shows. 

 Comedy at the Push Comedy Theater is back!
-Beer and Wine will be available.

-Get Select food items from the Wiener Hole.

-Waiters and Waitresses will be on hand to bring food and drinks to your seats.

-Hand sanitizing stations will be at the entrance and at the concession stand.

-Masks are encouraged and will be provided at the ticket booth if needed.

-Doors open at 7.

We are limiting this event to only 60 people.  Seats will be distanced 6 to 8 feet from each other. The show is general admission.

The Push Comedy Theater would like to thank The NorVa and Linda Daniel, Realtor. It's because of their generous support that our little comedy theater can start making people laugh again.

If you have questions, please email us at pusherscomedy@gmail.com

title: Improv 201: Scene Work & Short Form Games at the Training Center
description:
Improv 201: Scene Work and Short Form Games at the Training Center



This course builds upon the fundamentals and skills learned in 101. Students will focus on scene work, specifically building believable characters, strong relationships, and establishing baseline reality.



Students will also train in a variety of short form improv games similar to the ones seen on Whose Line is it Anyway?.



All classes will be outdoors and will practice social distancing measures. Masks are required. Graduation shows are delayed until further notice.



This is an intensive course offered outdoors at the Push Comedy Training Center. Class dates are 7/27, 7/28, 7/29, 8/3, 8/4, and 8/5 from 6:30 PM to 8:30 PM. This class caps at 10 students.

Cost: $200

 2710 Granby St, Norfolk, VA 23517

Please email pusherscomedy@gmail.com to be added to our wait list with the subject "Improv 201 Wait List". 

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.



Yes, and any questions? Email pusherscomedy@gmail.com

title: Improv 301: Intro to Harold and Game at Push Comedy Theater
description:
Improv 301: Intro to Harold and Game at Push Comedy Theater



This course builds upon the fundamentals and skills learned in 101 & 201. Students will learn the beginnings 'The Harold,' a long form improvisation structure developed by Del Close. They will learn how to identify the 'game' of a scene and how to heighten these games to develop 'second beats'.



All classes will be outdoors and will practice social distancing measures. Masks are required. Graduation shows are delayed until further notice.



This is an intensive course offered outdoors at the Push Comedy Theater. Class dates are 7/27, 7/28, 7/29, 8/3, 8/4, and 8/5 from 6:30 to 8:30 PM. This class caps at 10 students.

Cost: $200

763 Granby Street Norfolk, VA 23510

Please email pusherscomedy@gmail.com to be added to our wait list with the subject "Improv 301 Wait List". 

 Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.



Yes, and any questions? Email pusherscomedy@gmail.com

title: Sketch Comedy 101 at the Push Comedy Theater
description:
Unleash your inner Will Ferrell, Tina Fey, and Jordan Peele!!!

Sketch Comedy Writing 101

Here's your chance to dive head first into the wonderful world of sketch comedy! Whether you're a seasoned writer or someone who rarely (or never) picks up a pen, this class will teach how to get the funny ideas out of your head and onto the page. 

We will examine the various types of sketches, learn how to generate funny ideas and then turn them into sketches ready for the stage. 

This class is open to everyone, no writing or comedy experience is needed.

All classes will be outdoors and will practice social distancing measures. Masks are required. Graduation shows are delayed until further notice.

This is a six week class that meets every Tuesday from 6:30 PM to 8:30 PM starting July 28th. 
Cost: $200
776 Granby St Norfolk, VA 23510. 

This class caps at 10 students. Please email pusherscomedy@gmail.com to be added to our wait list with the subject “Sketch 101 Waitlist.”

Yes, and any questions? Email pusherscomedy@gmail.com
